dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint- KLIO
dmca.body:
March 1, 2007 

DMCA Complaint 
Google, Inc. 
Ann: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
fax: (650) 963-3255

 
1. The copyrighted work at issue is art that from the web site 
http://spqrblues.comicgenesis.com. The infringement consists of twelve pieces of artwork (a comic), substituting obscene dialogue (four-letter words, references to sexual acts, and derogatory and offensive references to homosexuality).
 
2. The infringing work consists of all images displayed (as of 5: 1 5pm Eastern, 
3/1/2007) here:
 
http://mcgravin.googlepages.com/spqr-blues.html 

3. I can be contacted at shop@klio.net.
 
4. This infringing website is on a googlepages.com account so contact information for the owner/administrator of the infringing webpage should be available to Google. 

5. I am amending the required statement (
